main event: A witness observed six round, red or maroon objects in a 'V' formation which then split into a straight line and faded slowly to the south.
interesting points: The objects were the size of peas., The sighting lasted about 30 seconds., The witness is considered to have insufficient reliability., The objects moved quickly across the sky., This case was categorized as Insufficient Data.
sighted object: six round red or maroon objects
